name: 2014 Dupont Research
tagline: Data and Analysis Materials in Research for Dr. Brandon Dupont (WWU Department of Economics)
body:
## Graphs ## Updates > Update: 06/29/2014 > - Refiled ICPSR Data into folders > - ICPSR 2393 Original TXT Data > - ICPSR 2393 CSV Files for All Data > - ICPSR 2393 DTA (Stata) Files for All Data > - ICPSR 2393 Codebook > - ICPSR 2393 Description > - ICPSR 2393 Manifest > - ICPSR 2393 Related Literature > - ICPSR 2393 Terms of Use > - (Not referenced in C1.2.1) ICPSR 2393 All US Banks (1896-1955) Graphs by Region > - (Not referenced in C1.2.1) ICPSR 2393 National US Banks (1896-1955) Graphs by Region > - (Not referenced in C1.2.1) ICPSR 2393 US Population (1896-1955) Graphs by Region > - (Not referenced in C1.2.1) ICPSR 2393 Population per National Bank (1896-1955) Graphs by Region > - (Not referenced in C1.2.1) ICPSR 2393 Population per Bank (1896-1955) Graphs by Region > Update: 06/14/2014 > - Updated CSV Files to remove unnecessary column, CSV should now be identical to DTA files > Update: 06/13/2014 > - Creation of repository > - Automatic .gitattributes from GitHub > - ICPSR 2896 CSV Files for DS 7-25 and 43 > - ICPSR 2896 DTA (Stata) Files for DS 7-25 and 43 > - ICPSR 2896 Codebook > - ICPSR 2896 Description > - ICPSR 2896 Manifest > - ICPSR 2896 Related Literature > - ICPSR 2896 Series 180 Related Literature > - ICPSR 2896 Terms of Use > - ICPSR 2896 Table of Contents for DS 7-25 and 43 > - ICPSR 2896 Dataset Summary for DS 7-25 and 43 ## Citations ### ICPSR 2393 Currently in use: - ICPSR 2393 All Data All data listed as ICPSR 2393 are from *United States Historical Data on Bank Market Structure, 1896-1955*. Principal is Mark D. Flood, Concordia University, Interuniversity Consortium for Political and Social Research. Persistent and stable access: http://doi.org/10.3886/ICPSR02393.v1 > Flood, Mark D. UNITED STATES HISTORICAL DATA ON BANK MARKET STRUCTURE, 1896-1955. ICPSR version. Montreal, Quebec: Mark D. Flood, Concordia University [producer], 1998. Ann Arbor, MI: Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research [distributor], 1998. http://doi.org/10.3886/ICPSR02393.v1 **DO NOT USE ANY ICPSR DATA OR DATASETS WITHOUT AUTHORIZED PERMISSION FROM ICPSR** ### ICPSR 2896 Currently in use: - ICPSR 2896 Datasets 7-25 - ICPSR 2896 Dataset 43 All data listed as ICPSR 2896 are from *Historical, Demographic, Economic, and Social Data: The United States, 1790-2002*. Principal is Michael R. Haines, Colgate University, Interuniversity Consortium for Political and Social Research. Persistent and stable access: http://doi.org/10.3886/ICPSR02896.v3 > Haines, Michael R., and Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research. Historical, Demographic, Economic, and Social Data: The United States, 1790-2002. ICPSR02896-v3. Ann Arbor, MI: Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research [distributor], 2010-05-21. http://doi.org/10.3886/ICPSR02896.v3 **DO NOT USE ANY ICPSR DATA OR DATASETS WITHOUT AUTHORIZED PERMISSION FROM ICPSR** ## Authors and Contributors Dr. Brandon Dupont, Associate Professor of Economics, Western Washington University: principle investigator and lead researcher.
Jade Coppieters @jadecoppieters: assisting with data processing, research, and analysis.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
